on reading compounds: 草【ソウ】draft, rough copy, highly cursive style (of writing Chinese characters), grass style
草案【ソウアン】draft (for a speech, bill, etc.)
起草【キソウ】drafting (e.g. a bill), drawing up
kun reading compounds: 草【くさ】grass, weed, herb, thatch, ninja, not genuine, substandard, LOL, haha
水草【みずくさ】water plant, aquatic plant, waterweed, hydrophyte
若草【わかくさ】green grass, young (fresh) grass
